positive_examples: This is an example of countersurveillance reasoning process.
The countersurveillance reasoning process demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed countersurveillance reasoning process in this context.
A typical case of countersurveillance reasoning process would involve these features.
The concept of countersurveillance reasoning process applies here.
The cognitive process of detecting and avoiding surveillance through systematic observation and analysis.
negative_examples: This is an example of evasion planning process, not countersurveillance reasoning process.
This represents tradecraft reasoning process in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvasionPlanningProcess, or other types of TradecraftReasoningProcess

definition: A reasoning process focused on detecting and evading surveillance activities.
